title: Nvidia stock rises after slight beat driven by A.I. chips
description: Nvidia has increasingly been seen by investors as one of the chip stocks best positioned to endure an economic slowdown that hurts PC and semiconductor sales.

title: After Mexican government cracked down on solar geoengineering, startup lets off balloons in Nevada
description: The solar geoengineering startup released balloons in Nevada after having its plans to release sulfur dioxide in Mexico thwarted by the Mexican government.

title: UN receives urgent plea to help free sailors, ships trapped in Ukraine since start of Russia war
description: The shipping industry is urging UN Secretary-General António Guterres to help sailors and vessels trapped in Ukrainian ports since the Russia war started.

title: Why a U.S. national electric grid would be great for the climate — and is nearly impossible
description: A macro grid would decrease the cost of reducing emissions and improve the reliability of the electric grid. But it's an almost impossible task for the U.S.

title: Lucid's revenue falls short of estimates as it guides to higher EV production in 2023
description: Lucid built just 7,000 of its Air luxury sedans last year amid manufacturing challenges but expects to make between 10,000 and 14,000 vehicles in 2023.

title: China provinces and Florida rank among the world's most climate-vulnerable areas
description: Major global industrial and economic centers at risk from rising sea levels, coastal flooding and wildfires, according to The Cross Dependency Initiative (XDI).

title: Fed minutes show members resolved to keep fighting inflation
description: While the meeting ended with a smaller rate hike than most of those implemented since early 2022, officials stressed that their concern over inflation is high.

title: Elon Musk meets with California Gov. Newsom at Tesla's new engineering headquarters to discuss expansion
description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk meets with Gov. Gavin Newsom to discuss business expansion in California.

title: Lidar maker Luminar announces 'multibillion dollar' expansion of its deal with Mercedes-Benz
description: The lidar units will be part of a significantly upgraded hands-free driving system that Mercedes-Benz plans to roll out across its lineup.

title: Microsoft brings its A.I. chatbot to Bing app on iPhone and Android
description: Microsoft on Wednesday announced the preview release of its new Bing app for iPhone and Android which includes new features like access to its AI chatbot.

title: I spent 5 years interviewing 233 millionaires—here's the No. 1 career move that made them rich
description: Tom Corley, a wealth researcher and bestselling author of "Rich Habits," spent five years studying the success habits of 233 millionaires. One thing they all had in common, he found, was knowing the right time to quit their regular jobs.

title: Pence says there are 'better choices' than Trump for 2024, calls to put entitlement cuts 'on the table'
description: The potential 2024 presidential candidate Pence also took a veiled swipe at Trump over Republicans' performance in the 2022 midterms.

title: SpaceX adjusts Starlink monthly pricing for residential customers based on service capacity
description: Starlink prices will rise for residential users in "limited capacity" areas but will fall for users in "excess capacity" areas, effective April 24.

title: British Steel proposes to close coking ovens in move that could cut 260 UK jobs
description: The company flagged that steelmaking in Britain remains "uncompetitive" despite cost-cutting steps.

title: Fed's James Bullard pushes for faster rate hikes, sees 'good shot' at beating inflation
description: Bullard told CNBC that a more aggressive rate hike now would give the FOMC a better chance to bring down inflation.

title: Adidas renews deal with Major League Soccer
description: Adidas' new deal with Major League Soccer will run through 2030.

title: Sweden and Finland's NATO membership is a 'matter of time' amid Turkey negotiations, Swedish foreign minister says
description: Tobias Billström told CNBC that Sweden had "worked to fulfil everything" it agreed to in a memorandum of understanding last summer.

title: Hong Kong unveils budget, promising 'abundant opportunities' as city recovers
description: Hong Kong's Financial Secretary Paul Chan struck a positive tone on Wednesday as he revealed the city's budget.

title: Jeep, Dodge maker Stellantis posts record annual profit, announces $4.47 billion shareholder payout
description: Carmaker Stellantis on Wednesday announced record full-year results, reporting a 26% rise in net profit to 16.8 billion euros ($17.9 billion) and a 41% annual jump in global battery and electric vehicle sales.

title: Supreme Court justices in Google case express hesitation about upending Section 230
description: Justices across the ideological spectrum expressed concern with breaking the delicate balance set by Section 230 in their ruling.

title: Asia-Pacific's highly skilled digital workers earn up to 65% more than their peers, survey shows
description: Digitally skilled workers in APAC earn 58% higher wages than their non-digital peers, a survey by Amazon Web Services and Gallup shows.

title: 'Unpredictable' election in Africa's largest economy is set to resonate around the world
description: Nigerians head to the polls on Saturday, with an unprecedented youth turnout expected against a backdrop of widespread insecurity and economic hardship.

title: Is Asia's bull market over? Strategists say there's room for stocks to rally further
description: Economists say MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan have further room to grow.

title: Amazon employees express dismay, anger about sudden return-to-office policy
description: A group of Amazon staffers spammed an internal website with comments expressing their anger over CEO Andy Jassy's return-to-office mandate

title: CNBC Daily Open: Markets took a beating — and there may be worse ahead
description: Stocks had their worst day in three months, with all major indexes losing at least 2%. The bottom may not be in as inflation remains stubborn.

title: Coinbase beats on revenue and earnings, but usage continues to decline
description: Coinbase beats on revenue and earnings, but usage continues to decline

title: Jim Cramer says six things must happen before the market sell-off can end
description: "Unfortunately, this Presidents Day sale doesn't feel like it's over," CNBC's Jim Cramer said.

title: Starbucks CEO Howard Schultz calls new olive oil coffee drinks 'transformational'
description: Starbucks CEO Howard Schultz said the new olive-oil coffee could disrupt the market.
